2143.subject: NURS
2143.descrlong: Students will be given selected readings in the theories and issues of nursing and service learning and will explore the connection between professional nursing practice and service learning. The course will explore the issues of social justice, oppression, liberation, and how the issues influence health care delivery and the profession of nursing. The course includes community activities in a health care setting that has consistent exposure to the practice of a Registered Nurse.
